bibl.title: Cessions of Katoikic Land in the Late Ptolemaic Period.
bibl.note: A version of this paper was read at the 21st International Congress of Papyrology, Berlin, August 13-19, 1995. - Discusses a number of texts which concern the cession of land from one kãtoikow ﬂppeÊw to another kãtoikow ﬂppeÊw. <katoikos hippeus>
OATES John F., Cessions of Katoikic Land in the Late Ptolemaic Period.
